subject: UNITED NATIONS ORGANIZATIONS
body:
UNITED NATIONS ORGANIZATIONS
405 E 45th St, New York, NY 10017, USA
Dear Email Owner/Fund Beneficiary,
COMPENSATION FUNDS PAYMENT ORDER
TO SCARM VICTIMS.
This is to inform you that, we have been working towards the
eradication of fraudsters and
scam Artists in Africa with the help of the Organization of African
Unity (OAU), the International
Monetary Fund (IMF) and FBI. We have been able to track down so many
of this scam artist in
various parts of African countries and Europe, which includes
(Nigeria, United Kingdom, Spain,
Ghana, Cameroon and Senegal) and they are all in Government custody
now, they will appear
at International Criminal Court (ICC) Hague (Netherlands) soon for
Criminal/Fraud Justice.
During the course of our investigation, we have been able to recover
so much money from these scam
artists. The United Nations Anti-Crime Commission and the
International Monetary Fund (IMF) have
ordered that the money recovered from the Scammers to be shared among
100 Lucky people around the
World for compensation. This Email/Letter is been directed to you
because your email address and country
name (South Africa) was found in one of the scammer Artists file and
computer hard-disk while the
investigation, maybe you have been scammed. You are therefore being
compensated with the sum of
USD,6.200,000 00. (Six Million Two Hundred Thousand United State Dollars).
We have arranged your payment to be paid to you direct to your bank
account in your country. To
receive the above fund, you are therefore advised to contact the
(South African Reserve Bank
private Bank Agent) who will transfer the fund to your bank account
from Reserve Bank. We have
advised the Bank Agent to open a private email address with a new
number as to enable us to monitor
this payment and the transfer communications to avoid further delay or
misdirection of your fund. Kindly
contact the South African Reserve Bank private Bank Agent now with the
below contact details:
Robbert Benjamin, 
Compensation Fund Transfer Dept.
(South African sun trust bank headquarter) West York Shire England.
Contact Email: (
specialagentrobbertbenjamin@gmail.com
) 
/Contact him now and forward the below details to him:
1. Your Full Name:
2. Your Age:
3. Occupation:
4. Cell/Mobile Number:
Yours in Service.
Dr Robbert Benjamin, a special diplomatic agent in
United Nations Funds Investigation unit.

subject: Re:   UNITED NATIONS ORGANIZATIONS
body:
Dear Dr. Robbert Benjamin,

Thank you for reaching out to me regarding the recovery of funds from scam artists. I appreciate the efforts of the United Nations, African Unity OAU, IMF, and FBI in combating fraudsters.

I must admit that I am a bit surprised to receive this email as I don't recall being scammed or having any involvement with such activities. Nevertheless, I am interested in learning more about how this recovery process works.

Could you please provide me with some additional information? How exactly was my email address and country name found in one of the scam artist's files? Is there any way for me to verify this information independently?

Furthermore, I would like to understand the process of receiving the funds directly into my bank account. Are there any fees or charges involved? And what are the necessary steps I need to take to ensure a smooth transfer?

Thank you for your assistance and looking forward to your response.

Best wishes,
Bonnie

subject: Re: UNITED NATIONS ORGANIZATIONS
body:
Thanks very much dear fund benefitiary, Bonnie

United Nations organization head office, and federal ministry of finance
has been reconfirmed you through the inquiries and investigation about your
past online experience verification process.

This is a compensation of fund payment order from OAU and United Nations
organization,to compensate those who were verified and recognized as a full
scammed victim of several occasions.
Since we got your information from one arrested scarmmer during his case of
Justice in international high court, therefore you must be compensated.

The fund document files and the certificate of ownership has to be

victim of several occasions, through the investigation of your past online
experience, since we got your information by one arrested scarmmer called
William.
